abilities.name: Conversion
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a basic Energy card from your hand. Porygon-Z is the same type as that Energy card until the end of your turn. This power can't be used if Porygon-Z is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Tri Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.
